title: Learning or Legitimacy? An Investigation of the Graduate Student Milestones within a Chemistry Doctoral Program

A Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) is defined as the highest achievable degree and represents the completion of a specialized mentored project. Concerningly, graduate programs are structured in ways that can...
